page.title: 18CLUBS IN MYDDLE
page.content: In Myddle there are a lot of clubs like the{Youth Club,}which gives enjoyment to young people. There are two agegroups which are the 8-11s junior{Youth Club}and the 11-16s senior{Youth Club. The{Monday Group}is held every Monday. In the summer it is held in the Church, but in the winter because of the cold it is held in the members homes. The{Senior Citizens Club}is held every month on a Thursday in the Village Hall.They hold Whist Drives and Bingo occasionally. The Village Hall holds Discos and Fetes. The{Womens Institute}meet every month and have demonstrations e.g. Summer Cookery, or Road Saftey by the{Police.
